import React, { Component } from 'react' import './Profile.css' import AuthService from '../../../../service/auth.service' import { Container, Row, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class Profile extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { user: [] } this.authService = new AuthService() console.log(props) } componentDidUpdate = () => { const userID = this.props.loggedUser.userID console.log(userID) this.authService .getOneUser(userID) .this.setState(loggedUser) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } deleteThisUser = () => { console.log(this.props) const userID = this.props.loggedUser._id this.authService .deleteUser(userID) .then(res => { this.props.history.push('/') }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } render() { return (

Â¡Bienvenid@, {this.props.loggedUser.username}!

Datos del perfil:

Nombre: {this.props.loggedUser.name}

Tu fecha de nacimiento es: {this.props.loggedUser.birthday}!

Editar perfil

) } } export default Profile
